summary: As a front-end developer, I have a wealth of experience and passion for creating intuitive, engaging user interfaces. Experience in international teams helps to quickly integrate into the team. I am inspired by my work, I am inspired by people and I am ready for new challenges.

experience.duties: I worked with one of the largest and most famous retailers in the USA - Macy's and Bloomingdale's. My work consisted of writing new components according to the design, editing existing components and pages, writing other functionality. I also had some experience working with Vue.js, because the goal was to rewrite the project on Vue.
experience.technologies: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Backbone.js, Marionette, Handlebars, Vue.js, Figma, Jira

experience.duties: I worked on creating presentations of medical products for clients from all over the world. I created interactive presentations with analytics, surveys and other features using html, css, javascript, lit-element. Presentations were developed for different types of desktops, tablets, mobile and other devices.
experience.technologies: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Lit-element, Salesforce, Anthill Activator, Veeva Vault, Jira

experience.duties: I worked part-time on the Metinvest project. I created components for the storybook using React and Typescript.
